parties.raw_snippet: THIS SERVICE AGREEMENT FOR TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES (this “Agreement”) between Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund, a Delaware statutory trust (“Client”) and Mellon Investor Services LLC (operating with the service name BNY Mellon Shareowner Services), a New Jersey limited liability company (“Agent”), is dated as of January 26, 2011.
parties.reasoning: The opening sentence of the Agreement expressly states the parties by name and their roles (Client and Agent). This is the conventional location and wording used to identify contracting parties.
normalized_value: Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund

contract_type.raw_snippet:
SERVICE AGREEMENT
FOR
TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES
TO
BLACKSTONE / GSO LONG-SHORT CREDIT INCOME FUND
contract_type.reasoning: The document title and repeated substantive provisions (e.g., appointment of Agent as transfer agent, registrar and dividend disbursing agent, and detailed services in Exhibit B) indicate the primary purpose is a services arrangement under which Agent provides transfer-agent and related services to Client.

notice_period.raw_snippet: Unless either party gives written notice of termination of this Agreement at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term, or any successive three-year term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms;
notice_period.reasoning: Section 2 contains the auto-renewal prevention clause requiring written notice "at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term, or any successive three-year term." This is the advance notice required to prevent automatic renewal.

expiration_date.raw_snippet: Agent’s appointment hereunder shall commence on the next business day after the later of (i) the date hereof, or (ii) the date Agent has confirmed that Client’s records have been converted to Agent’s system (the “Effective Date”), and shall continue for three years thereafter (the “Initial Term”).
expiration_date.reasoning: Section 2 specifies the initial term as continuing "for three years thereafter (the 'Initial Term')," which describes the contract's expiration relative to the Effective Date (a relative term, not a calendar date).

renewal_term.raw_snippet: Unless either party gives written notice of termination of this Agreement at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term, or any successive three-year term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms;
renewal_term.reasoning: Section 2 states the Agreement "shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms" unless timely notice is given, which defines the automatic renewal period.

agreement_date.reasoning: The signature/introductory sentence states the agreement "is dated as of January 26, 2011," which is the date the contract was signed/made.

effective_date.raw_snippet: Agent’s appointment hereunder shall commence on the next business day after the later of (i) the date hereof, or (ii) the date Agent has confirmed that Client’s records have been converted to Agent’s system (the “Effective Date”), and shall continue for three years thereafter (the “Initial Term”).
effective_date.reasoning: Section 2 defines "Effective Date" as the next business day after the later of the agreement date or the date Agent confirms conversion of Client records; this is a contingent/relative definition rather than a specific calendar date.

governing_law.raw_snippet: This Agreement shall be governed by, construed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, without regard to principles of conflicts of law.
governing_law.reasoning: Section 19(b) explicitly states the governing law for the Agreement as the laws of the State of New York.
